name: 郭儀風
objective: 本課程旨在透過流行文化的閱讀與討論，厚植英語文實力，並深入了解英美當代社會文化現象。課程選材涵蓋通俗文學、電影、音樂、體育、電視、網路等各種流行文化議題，著重修辭分析，文本摘要，以及批判式閱讀技巧的訓練，期能以多元互動的方式深化英語文能力。
schedule:
Week 1  Orientation
Week 2  Current issues around the world
Week 3  Current issues around the world
Week 4  Sentence structures
Week 5  Exercises
Week 6  Current issues around the world
Week 7  Current issues around the world
Week 8  How to spot trends
Week 9  Midterm Presentation
Week 10  Midterm Presentation
Week 11  Current issues around the world
Week 12  Current issues around the world 
Week 13  Current issues around the world
Week 14  Current issues around the world
Week 15  Current issues around the world
Week 16  Current issues around the world
Week 17  Final Presentation
Week 18  Final Presentation
scorePolicy:
Attendance and class performance 60%
Midterm Presentation 20%
Final Presentation 20%
